abstract: American-led airstrikes destroy 14 Syrian Army tanks at military base near Palmyra that had been captured by Islamic State; American officers warned Syrian and Russian counterparts they would destroy weaponry rather than risk it being used by militants.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: American military leaders had warned their Russian and Syrian counterparts about the strikes, meant to keep militants from using the captured weapons.
snippet: American military leaders had warned their Russian and Syrian counterparts about the strikes, meant to keep militants from using the captured weapons....

headline.main: U.S. Destroys 14 Tanks at ISIS-Held Base in Syria
headline.print_headline: U.S. Airstrikes Destroy Tanks Held by ISIS
